name: homework-02-jinxu518
description: ```JavaScript {     "_id":ObjectId,     "teachers": [         {"_id":ObjectId, "name":"Asaad"},         {"_id":ObjectId, "name":"Umur"}     ],     "courses":[         {"_id":ObjectId, "title": "CS477", "students":[             {"_id":ObjectId, "name":"John"},             {"_id":ObjectId, "name":"Selin"}         ]},         {"_id":ObjectId, "title": "CS571", "students":[             {"_id":ObjectId, "name":"Alican"},             {"_id":ObjectId, "name":"Dean"}         ]}     ] } ``` ## Your are responsible on writing an application to have 6 restful APIs which satisfy the following features. 1. Add teacher 2. Update teacher 3. Delete teacher 4. Add a new student to specific course 5. Update a student's name 6. Delete a student
